title: Time Portal Icon - Missing or mistaken?
body:
Having bought Pulsefire Ezreal, I was given the icon correlating to the skin (_Pulsefire Ezreal Icon_), along with the skin themed icon (_Pulsefire Icon_). Althought, after looking at the news pages and other sites, it shows that the **Time Portal Icon** would also be given along with the Ezreal skin, and having not received it, I was wondering if I could ask about the issue.

I could be mistaken, and that the Time Portal icon is given to those who have owned the Pulsefire Ezreal skin pre-update, which I can understand. It could also be just that I have _yet_ to receive the icon as of May 29th.

Clarification would be great, thanks for reading !
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: You're correct! Anyone owning Pulsefire Ezreal (regardless of when they bought him) will be getting both the Pulsefire Ezreal and Time Portal icons. I went ahead and pulled up your account, and it does look like you've already received both of them! Make sure to double check your icons for the Time Portal icon.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=HjMfLGV1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-27T01:36:02.435+0000)
>
> You're correct! Anyone owning Pulsefire Ezreal (regardless of when they bought him) will be getting both the Pulsefire Ezreal and Time Portal icons. I went ahead and pulled up your account, and it does look like you've already received both of them! Make sure to double check your icons for the Time Portal icon.

Hi I haven't received my time portal icon either. I did open a support ticket but it hasn't yet been answered.
